about_the_game:
Alone on Halloween? How pathetic. Learn and choose how to live your sorry life, talk to a series of surreal visitors and witness the unspeakable in this highly interactive and atmospheric life simulator.

Features

  • Complete house filled with interactions, secrets and atmosphere.

  • 20+ unique characters to befriend, offend, kill or avoid through dynamic dialogues.

  • Two hands! Manipulate the world as you would in real life.

  • 200+ unique items to experiment with.

  • Simulated fire, water, electricity and surface painting (dirt, blood, burns, water).

  • Cooking, sleeping and bathroom simulation.

  • Fully interactive in-game computer. Order things to be delivered to your doorstep!

  • It's a little spooky.

content_descriptors.notes:
Assume that crude language, most sensitive topics, violence, nudity, consumption and references to drugs are present. 

The game allows you to remove all your clothes and look down at your body or use mirrors. Genitalia is not rendered on yourself, but character designs later on in the game should be assumed to be partially or fully nude, or sometimes gory and offensive. The "life simulation" gameplay means you can poop and pee, smear poop everywhere if you so desire, eat and puke, give and receive violence.

You can willingly kill yourself in many ways. This is presented in a somewhat humorous manner (e.g. sticking a fork in an electrical outlet).

Some will find the game scary, as the use of atmosphere may lead to tense situation.

This is definitely a 17+ game. Young kids should not play this.

name: NEET Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 / ATI Radeon 6670
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% compatible with DirectX 10
